strings.Value: All allies in range of the Angelic Halo gain {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} equal to 10 + your mythic rank for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} upon taking {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

All allies in range of the Angelic Halo get fire, cold, acid, and electricity {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} equal to 5 per mythic rank, sonic and negative energy resistance equal to 3 per mythic rank, and force, unholy, holy, and divine resistance equal to 1 per mythic rank.

All enemies in range of the Angelic Halo suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to 1 + half your mythic rank.

All demon and undead enemies in range of the Angelic Halo suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} per mythic rank each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.

Any enemy that attacks you for the first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + highest ability modifier) or be {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 rounds. On a successful save, the enemy is blinded for 1 round.
